helpText.helpText:
Creates a pickle of the provided JavaScript file's classes, attributes and methods 
Syntax: create_pickle

Loads data from a provided Javascript file 
Syntax: load_data [file path]

Extracts data from loaded JavaScript file 
Syntax: extract_data

Converts extracted data and displays image 
Syntax: convert_to_uml

Detects the loaded file is javaScript file 
Syntax: read_js [file path]

Prints the working directory 
Syntax: pwd

Shows MySQL version and connection 
Syntax: db_connect

To select a table you want to see with stored data 
Syntax: table_select [-options] 
Options: 
 -a: Select attributes table 
 -m: Select methods table 
 -c: Select all extracted class table
Add extracted data to mysql, at the same time, create the needed table.

Uses WAVI project to generate UML diagram 
Syntax: wavi [file path]

To load the pickle data  
Syntax: use_pickle

Delete the created pickle 
Syntax: delete_pickle [pickle_path]

Can draw a diagram from the data in database 
Syntax: draw_chart

Can validate the extracted data print it as a list for further use. Syntax: validate_data [-options] 
Options: 
 -a: Validate how many attributes are extracted, format: [attr_id] [class_id] [attr_name] 
 -m: Validate how many methods are extracted, format: [method_id] [class_id] [method_name] 
 -c: Validate how many classes are extracted, format: [class_id] [class_name]
Can read js code and extract the variables and functions. Syntax: js_parser [-file path]
